title: Emomii: Mood Tracker
desc: A full stack application that allows a user to track their moods and emotions as well as write daily journal entries. Their emotional state is then tracked on charts and graphs to help the user identify emotional patterns

title: Password Generator
desc: An Application that will generate a secure password based on user set parameters

title: Game of Clicks
desc: A memory game made with React, Click on as many characters as possible without clicking on the same character twice.

title: Employee Directory
desc: An Employee Directory app made with react that allows a user to search for employees and filter results

title: Tech Blog
desc: A Full stack application that allows users to create an account and post blog entries to the public forum

title: Note Taker
desc: Allows a user to write, store, and delete notes

title: Work Day Scheduler
desc: An Application that uses local storage to store and plan a users day at work.

title: Work Day Scheduler
desc: An Application that allows a user to pull current weather information as well as a 5-day forcast for their selected destination

title: E-Commerce Backend
desc: For this project I demonstrated how to connect to a backend server to make GET/PUT/POST/DELETE requests with insomnia

title: Team Profile Generator
desc: For this project I created a command line application, running on node.js to gather team member information and then renders an HTML page
